name: Joe & T-Bag: Mice In Cups
description:
Joe & T-Bag are mice in cups! Though they play differently and live in different worlds, they work together to reach their goals!

Turn-based puzzle game where you control Joe the platform character and T-Bag the top-down character.

Includes 7 levels.

Made within 48 hours for GMTK Jam 2021, where the theme was "Joined Together".

Music & Character Art:                 JapeNess

Code & Unity Monkey & SFX:     Kokolihapihvi

Level Design & World Art:            Jorava

Source code: https://github.com/joonaskilpela/gmtkJam2021
